name: 1inch
challengeTitle: NFT Marketplace on the 1inch Limit Order Protocol
challengeDesc: An adapter for creating limit orders over the 1inch Liquidity Protocol or over any decentralized exchange (DEX), based on their available liquidity.
benefitIntro: Our team has integrated the Limit Order Protocol V2, facilitating the most innovative and flexible limit order swap opportunities in DeFi.
benefit1: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX encourages Trading NFTs anywhere at anytime.
benefit2: Introduction of Ava's Push Notification Service (APNS.io) to immediately alert users of trade activity.
benefit3: Greater market exposure for trading NFTs.
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with 1inch.
